greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square array A, where entry A(y,x) has the ternary digits of y interleaved with the ternary digits of x, converted back to decimal. Listed by antidiagonals: A(0,0), A(0,1), A(1,0), A(0,2), A(1,1), A(2,0), ...
link: A. Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..3320
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jul 29 2009
